intro.description: We reimagine retail. By inventing our own technologies that put business first, drive sustainability, and focus on people and performance, we're creating a new way to manage and experience commerce.

aboutVusionSolutions.label: About Vusion Solutions
aboutVusionSolutions.header: Transform your physical stores into digital assets
aboutVusionSolutions.description: Vusion technology digitalizes your store from floor to ceiling to create a sustainable, hybrid model that's driven by data. Provide a better commerce experience — for consumers and associates — while enhancing profitability.

opportunities.label: Oppurtunities
opportunities.header: Commerce issues are unique and complex — we're here to help

list.title: Enabling low-carbon e-Commerce
list.description: Turn physical stores into ultra-efficient local fulfilment centers of online orders. Identify the right store and product availability in real-time, for every online order to delivery time & reduced carbon emissions.

list.title: Gaining full-store visibility
list.description: Our technologies allow you to control costs and improve inventory turnover with real-time visibility and actionable insights. Maximize on-shelf availability, using automatic monitoring, alerts and re-orders.

list.title: Improving store performance
list.description: A smart, connected infrastructure runs your store seamlessly — from pricing, to inventory management, merchandising, and more — freeing you to focus on what's next for your business and your customers.

list.title: Increasing employee satisfaction
list.description: Automate time-consuming processes like pricing and promotions to effectively eliminate errors and free employees to focus on tasks that are more fulfilling and add more value — like engaging with customers.

list.title: Accounting for market trends
list.description: Be prepared for shifts in the economy and the flow of market trends. Tackle excess inventory, higher costs, and lower margins with retail analytics and IoT solutions that provide actionable insights.

list.title: Improving shopper experience
list.description: Enhance brand experiences and improve in-store shopping for your customers with creative digital signage, brand content, dynamic promotions, and accurate pricing at the shelf.

products.label: Products
products.header: Sustainable, human solutions for a better commerce experience
products.description: Improve overall store efficiency and business performance with connected technologies that digitize your physical store to create a smarter, more efficient shopping experience for customers, retailers, and brands.

carousalItems.description: Digitalize your physical store operations from end-to-end with a sustainable, secure, scalable solution. Improve day-to-day employee experience with high-performance IoT and retail analytics.

carousalItems.header: Boost sales and improve overall store efficiency
carousalItems.description: Leverage the highest-quality IoT price automation platform to remove manual pricing steps and eliminate errors, freeing your team to focus on customers.

carousalItems.header: Gain real-time shelf visibility with our wireless mini camera system
carousalItems.description: Maximize on-shelf availability and optimize inventory management with automatic monitoring and alerts, and re-orders predefined by you.

carousalItems.header: Improve inventory turnover — down to the individual SKU
carousalItems.description: Harness the power of your data by applying A.I. to your existing data collections to deliver actionable insights that improve workflows and customer experience.

carousalItems.header: Run successful digital display campaigns in your store
carousalItems.description: Run digital campaigns instantly, monetize your foot traffic and partner with brands to connect with shoppers at the shelf and improve inventory turnover.

carousalItems.header: Share the right information in the right place at the right time
carousalItems.description: Leverage high-quality digital signage displays to get your message out when it's most relevant to the customer.

positiveCommerce.label: Positive Commerce
positiveCommerce.description: The digitalization of physical commerce is an economic, social, and environmental imperative. Our mission is to transform stores through our Vusion technologies into intelligent, connected, and long-lasting digital environments to enable a sustainable, positive and human-centered commerce business model.

list.name: Dave Fleming
list.designation: Area Manager at Lee’s Discount Liquor
list.description: We're given back time to our employees that they can utilize to actually get on the floor, talk to customers, actually do that customer service engagement properly rather than putting up tags.

list.name: Tom Buckley
list.description: We have never had so much visibility over our stores. We had ideas of what was working and what wasn't, but everything was anecdotal. Now everything is data-driven. The stores love it too, some of the managers are addicted!

list.name: Bala Prasanna
list.description: We’ve been testing digital solutions that will help us manage price changes electronically, allowing associates more time to do what matters most — help our customers.

list.name: Noel Kavanagh Jnr
list.designation: Store and Managing Director of Kavanagh Group
list.description: The 360 store delivers capabilities that allow us to get timely insights and visibility on shelf stock availability, promotion execution, “proof of play” and more accurate and efficient restocking.

list.name: Caleb Ropp
list.designation: VP Operations & HR of Homes Pets Alive
list.description: Homes Alive Pets has almost an immediate impact with the Captana cameras. We improved our shelf availability +3% after two months of implementation and it’s fundamentally changed how we operate as a company.

list.name: Massimo Masoni
list.description: With Captana I can check on a weekly basis if out of stocks are caused by logistical disservices or incorrect reorders and then, determine which operations require more attention in the store.

upcomingEvents.label: Upcoming Events
upcomingEvents.description: Join us at our next events!

careers.label: Careers
careers.description: Join our talented, multidisciplinary, multicultural team and help build the future of retail IoT.

intro.label: Partner first
intro.description: We empower partners to achieve outstanding growth.

principles.description: Together we create excellence for our customers. Our partners are strongly committed to developing retail IoT business and have capabilities to cover activities in sales, installation, integration, and support.
Loyalty, innovation, ethics, and environmental responsibility are values that we wish to share, promote, and develop with our partners.
Customer satisfaction is at the heart of our promise. To respond to each customer’s needs — immediately and everywhere — we elect and push for partners who deliver the highest level of service.

howWePartners.label: How we partner
howWePartners.header: Partners can differentiate their business and market with VusionGroup, whether they are a technology or service partner, and sell their skill sets through our Partner First Program.

list.description: STA: Global technical leaders who work closely with VusionGroup to build and deliver standards-based, integrated solutions to mutual customers.

VAR: Those who offer add-ons and additional services to our solutions. They customize offers with hardware and software by developing add-on features and ensuring all components work together properly.
MSP: Offers specialized and high-value added services in the field of network, WiFi management, security, and installation.
ISV: Engaged in the development of their own software applications and partnering through our software APIs.

benefits.label: Benefits
benefits.description: We offer collaborative and scaled resources for partners to help sell to customers and grow their business faster. As partners move up in level, they receive additional benefits.

items.description: Sales Manager access — CoSell Lead transmission
Access to special marketing resources and funds

becomePartner.label: Become a Partner
becomePartner.description: Our common mission: helping physical retailers and brands to achieve their digital revolution and turn physical stores into high-value digital assets — more automated, data-driven, and connected to consumers and suppliers. We enable better service and information, for frictionless, ubiquitous, and personalized shopping experiences, while ensuring utmost data integrity and personal data privacy.

intro.label: Overview | Positive Commerce
intro.description: We’re committed to making a positive impact through our sustainable, human-centered commerce technologies.

ourMission.label: Our Mission
ourMission.header: Our mission is to support physical stores with intelligent, connected, and long-lasting digital ecosystems to enable sustainable business models.

list.description: We imagine, design, and deliver solutions that provide a better commerce experience for customers and associates through versatile, efficient technologies that make a positive impact.
Through better data, IoT, and automations solutions, we are improving efficiency and inventory management in physical stores, while reducing waste and avoiding GHG emissions.

productsOverviewTabs.title: Intelligent Pricing and Promotions
productsOverviewTabs.description: Improve responsiveness, precision, and quality in pricing automatically with connected IoT electronic shelf labels. Get actionable insights to optimize promotions and keep up with changing markets.

productsOverviewTabs.title: Real-Time Shelf Monitoring
productsOverviewTabs.description: Maximize on-shelf availability with mini wireless cameras that connect to insights dashboards to provide real-time data and analysis.

productsOverviewTabs.title: Real-Time Store and Consumer Data
productsOverviewTabs.description: Know exactly what’s on your shelves at all times and monetize customer foot traffic with AI-powered insights that help improve inventory turnover down to the individual SKU.

productsOverviewTabs.title: In-Store Digital Advertising

productsOverviewTabs.title: Industry Inventory Management
productsOverviewTabs.description: Leverage high-quality digital signage displays to get your message out when it’s most relevant to the customer — throughout your store and the shelf.

intro.header: Connect In-Store Operations with Data-Augmented Intelligence
intro.description: VusionLive transforms in-store operations by connecting advanced IoT and data analytics with real-time activities in the aisles, delivering actionable insights that inform everyday processes, drive better operational efficiency, enhance store performance, and accelerate sales growth.

retailAnalytics.subtitle: High-performance retail analytics
retailAnalytics.header: Transforming Retail Operations with Data and AI
retailAnalytics.description: VusionLive is a comprehensive retail intelligence platform that uniquely integrates real-time IoT data — capturing precise in-store conditions — with sales figures, loyalty programs, and third-party intelligence. It provides actionable recommendations for optimizing pricing, assortment, and merchandising, while supporting their execution through integrated campaign management and operational tools.

eachBlockInfo.title: Unified Store Management
eachBlockInfo.description: Consolidates store activities into a single platform, enabling associates to efficientlty prioritize tasks, manage ESLs, and share data in real time.

eachBlockInfo.title: Centralized Campaign Execution
eachBlockInfo.description: Simplifies in-store campaigns, enabling store teams to execute centrally planned promotions while driving shopper engagement.

eachBlockInfo.title: Data-Driven Pricing Intelligence
eachBlockInfo.description: Ensures stores are price-compliant and competitive through actionable insights from real-time data and IoT feedback.

eachBlockInfo.title: Connected Inventory Management
eachBlockInfo.description: Leverages real-time data to inform and prioritize inventory decisions for stores, minimizing stockouts.

eachBlockInfo.title: Optimized Offering Insights
eachBlockInfo.description: Uncovers offering gaps and provides local stores with tailored recommendations to boost sales performance.

eachBlockInfo.title: Compliant Merchandising & Assortment
eachBlockInfo.description: Enables stores to execute compliant planograms and assortments,improving visibility and driving in-store sales growth.

eachBlockInfo.title: Collaborative HQ-Store Workflow
eachBlockInfo.description: Ensures smooth collaboration between HQ and stores, empowering store teams to execute on strategies consistently and efficiently.

eachBlockInfo.title: Unified Store Management
eachBlockInfo.description: (ESLs) to monitor competitor pricing, ensure compliance, and react quickly to pricing shifts with instant alerts, maximizing pricing effectiveness.

eachBlockInfo.title: Centralized Campaign Execution
eachBlockInfo.description: Launch and manage targeted campaigns with real-time performance tracking, enabling you to adjust strategies on the go and achieve higher engagement and ROI.

eachBlockInfo.title: Enhance Stock Management
eachBlockInfo.description: Detect stockouts instantly and receive actionable restocking recommendations powered by real-time data, ensuring shelves are always replenished to meet customer demand

eachBlockInfo.title: Improve Assortment Effectiveness
eachBlockInfo.description: Analyze real-time performance data to identify top-performing products and underperformers, helping refine your assortment strategy for maximum impact.

eachBlockInfo.title: Monitor Performance Metrics
eachBlockInfo.description: Track store performance against key financial and operational goals, gaining insights to drive continuous improvement and profitability.

eachBlockInfo.title: Ensure Planogram Compliance
eachBlockInfo.description: Receive real-time alerts on planogram adherence, ensuring in-store displays align with strategic merchandising plans to boost sales and enhance the shopper experience.

Features.subtitle: Features
Features.header: Ground your decision-making with trusted insights and performance simulations
Features.description: Advanced-Data Integration: Seamlessly integrate and aggregate diverse data sources, providing a unified and comprehensive view of business performance Actionable Business Recommendations: Beyond traditional analytics, RI delivers actionable business recommendations tailored for both day-to-day operations and strategic initiatives to drive efficiency and growth in retail operations. Embedded Simulation Tools: Leverage robust simulation capabilities to test and optimize various aspects of your operations, such as product assortment, pricing strategies, and merchandising techniques. Connection to In-Store IoT with Floor Messaging: Translate data into action, by automatically displaying messaging on in-store Electronic Shelf Labels to communicate with store associates or calling out promotions and price matching for shoppers.

faqAccordion.header: VusionCloud: unique Cloud Solution for Retailers

eachBlockInfo.label: What differentiates Memory from other retail intelligence software?
eachBlockInfo.description: Memory sets itself apart from other retail intelligence software through several key differentiators. Firstly, we boast a modern and innovative in-house platform that utilizes different data sets to address specific use cases. Moreover, we excel in leveraging loyalty card data, a valuable asset in the retail landscape. Unlike other software, Memory actively supports decision-making processes, ensuring that our insights translate into actionable strategies. Our platform is highly agile and customizable, tailored to the unique needs and processes of each retailer and brand. With a team possessing strong expertise in retail, we prioritize innovation and focus on answering critical business questions through data-driven insights. Our agile platform allows for seamless customization to match our clients’ processes and needs, ensuring a tailored and effective solution.

eachBlockInfo.label: How does Memory Retail Intelligence software impact pricing?
eachBlockInfo.description: With our unique Asset Management add-on, VusionCloud provides valuable insights to help optimize and extend the lifespan of

eachBlockInfo.title: How does Memory retail intelligence software impact sales and store performance?
eachBlockInfo.description1: 2% to 4% of sales growth through assortment optimization
eachBlockInfo.description3: 50% to 70% productivity gain on category management tasks

intro.description: Track, monitor, and manage retail IoT devices from anywhere.

retailAnalytics.subtitle: Retail IoT Platform
retailAnalytics.description: Our VusionCloud platform is a retail IoT management solution that enables you to track, monitor, and manage digital price tags and IoT devices from anywhere, anytime. Close monitoring capabilities for millions of devices at once — from tracking asset shipments to streamlining warranty and RMA processes — enable you to streamline operations at minimal cost. VusionCloud offers security, scalability, and reliability while keeping costs under control for retailers with a SaaS-based model.

Opportunities.header: VusionCloud: unique Cloud Solution for Retailers

eachBlockInfo.title: Limitless scalability
eachBlockInfo.description: VusionCloud is built on an elastic model for greater scalability — allowing retail businesses to expand their IoT infrastructure as they grow, easily and quickly.

eachBlockInfo.title: Keep track of your IoT Devices
eachBlockInfo.description: Track your IoT assets from shipment to store shelves. Receive timely alerts via app and API, get valuable usage insights, and ensure devices are running smoothly.

eachBlockInfo.title: Make the most of your IoT
eachBlockInfo.description: Rapidly scale your connected IoT devices with ease, through seamless integration with a unified platform leveraging the market-leading IoT protocol in retail.

eachBlockInfo.title: See ROI impact

Features.subtitle: Features
Features.header: Join us in the future of retail
Features.description: +26K stores in the cloud +188M million managed labels Over 100M/hr item integration Over 1bn/hr 10M updates in less than 2 hrs. ISO 27001 certified ISO 9001 certified

CloudProduct.subtitle: VusionCloud Products
CloudProduct.header: Get detailed information on the VusionCloud family of products
CloudProduct.description: Listen to the RETHINK Retail podcast hosted by retail expert, Matthew Adam Smith: Clément Galeron, our esteemed Client Director at VusionGroup, discusses the power of our ‘In The Memory’ solution in transforming retail intelligence by harnessing valuable data and turning insights into actionable strategies.

eachBlockInfo.label: What is VusionCloud and how can it transform my in-store IoT device management as a cloud solution for retailers?
eachBlockInfo.description: VusionCloud is a Cloud Retail IoT platform with the strongest security, reliability, and performances. It allows customers to track, manage and monitor their electronic shelf labels throughout their lifecycle, from delivery to end-of-life.

eachBlockInfo.label: In what ways can VusionCloud help reduce operational costs for retailers seeking a cloud solution?
eachBlockInfo.description: VusionCloud is a Software as a Service platform that helps retailers reduce their operational costs by automating many routine tasks at the shelf such as price and promotion updates, and requires no capital expenditures, no new store hardware equipment, and no expensive/hidden operating costs.

eachBlockInfo.title: Is VusionCloud easily integrated with other existing systems in my retail environment?
eachBlockInfo.description: Thanks to its wide range of APIs, retailers can easily integrate VusionCloud in their own ecosystem. Our APIs agility enables rapid access to a whole range of possibilities to deliver additional value in stores on-demand.

eachBlockInfo.title: What kind of support does VusionCloud offer to ensure retailers' success with this cloud solution?
eachBlockInfo.description: With VusionCloud, customers ensure that prices and promotions are always synchronized online and in-store. Thanks to its web and mobile interfaces, retailers can have a real-time access to the store activity and the status of its assets, from anywhere at anytime. VusionCloud also includes a monitoring tool to identify and spot unusual device or infrastructure behavior to reduce mean-time-to-resolution and ensure accurate pricing in the store.

intro.header: Improve store efficiency with advanced digital pricing solutions
intro.description: Automate pricing processes and remove manual steps to eliminate errors.

retailAnalytics.subtitle: Premier electronic shelf labels
retailAnalytics.description: Our SESimagotag platform is the key to transforming your physical store into a digital asset. We offer the highest quality electronic shelf labels, empowering retailers to be more agile, responsive, and accurate in all pricing operations — and beyond. Our electronic shelf labels can display relevant information in addition to pricing — like product ratings, customer reviews, and nutritional information for shoppers and actionable data, delivery information, and stock levels for associates.

eachBlockInfo.title: Update prices with one click
eachBlockInfo.description: Leveraging a central management platform, ESLs enable retailers to update pricing at the store or chain level — in a matter of seconds — for hassle-free pricing management.

eachBlockInfo.title: Engage shoppers and streamline operations
eachBlockInfo.description: ESLs allow information sharing beyond pricing, such as delivering rich or local product information or activation campaigns for shoppers. Associates can view operational data at the shelf, enabling faster and smoother workflows.

eachBlockInfo.title: Easy integrations
eachBlockInfo.description: SESimagotag’s ESLs are infraless, leveraging existing network infrastructures in-store to ensure fast turnaround times, facilitate systems maintenance, and lower retailers’ carbon footprint across entire store chains.

eachBlockInfo.description: Enhance responsiveness, precision, and quality in pricing execution at the store or retail chain level with a single management platform.

eachBlockInfo.title: Smooth operations
eachBlockInfo.description: Display ERP, inventory, or any other operational data for in-store associates to access real-time information about stocking and inventory.

eachBlockInfo.title: Accelerate pick-up orders
eachBlockInfo.description: Improve your buy-online-pick-up-in-store experience for your customers with geolocation and pick-to-light capabilities embedded in our ESLs.

eachBlockInfo.title: Engage with in-store shoppers
eachBlockInfo.description: Connect with customers at the shelf to help them discover new products, find relevant information, see promotional offers, or get digital coupons.

Features.description: With Engage software you can easily schedule and automate new content through playlists associated with in-store touchpoints — individually, by group, or through an entire retail chain with just one click.

benchMark.description: Determine campaign performance — product by product — and benchmark it against your store and other products’ performance. Get comprehensive reports on campaign execution with shelf images taken throughout the campaign.

EngageProduct.subtitle: Engage Products
EngageProduct.header: Get detailed information on the Engage family of products

eachBlockInfo.label: What are the main features of Vusion's retail marketing solutions?
eachBlockInfo.description1: Precise and agile campaign programming and execution directly at the shelf.
eachBlockInfo.description2: Integration of marketing content with accurate price information on in-store touchpoints.
eachBlockInfo.description3: Flexibility of in-store touchpoints, customizable to store concepts, available space, and marketing objectives (size, color options, dynamic or static content).
eachBlockInfo.description4: Comprehensive analytics offering monitoring of execution, analysis of foot traffic, proximity, and dwell time via sensors, along with performance measurement through shopper data analytics.

eachBlockInfo.label: How do Engage's retail marketing solutions captivate shoppers at the shelf?
eachBlockInfo.description: Engage offers an in-store marketing platform, empowering both retailers and brands to launch digital campaigns directly within physical stores. Leveraging Shelf Edge rails and V700/ESLs strategically positioned at the shelf, Engage ensures messages are delivered precisely when and where shoppers are making purchasing decisions. These dynamic digital campaigns not only captivate shoppers but also optimize ad spend returns for brands, while simultaneously driving additional revenues for retailers.

eachBlockInfo.title: How does Engage's retail marketing solutions handle the interaction between retailers, brands, and retail media campaigns?
eachBlockInfo.description: Engage acts as an intermediary between retailers and brands, encouraging the use of self-service tools to facilitate content publication and ensure retailers profit from selling ad space.

eachBlockInfo.title: Can Engage's retail marketing solutions be customized for different retail environments?
eachBlockInfo.description: Engage offers extensive customization options to adapt to diverse retail environments. Content can be tailored to suit specific needs, ensuring relevance and effectiveness. Additionally, various hardware configurations, such as rails of different lengths and monitors of different sizes (ranging from 60cm to 120cm) including options like LCD or e-paper displays, can be implemented to match the requirements of different retail spaces. Clients can leverage our API to seamlessly integrate Engage with their CMS, allowing for comprehensive customization and integration tailored to their unique environment and objectives.

intro.description: Digitalize paper-based signage and automate operations.

retailAnalytics.subtitle: High-performance digital signage
retailAnalytics.description: PDI Digital’s sepioo® is an IoT-based solution that enables businesses to automate and digitize their processes, eliminating the need for manual and paper-based operations. With the combination of a SaaS platform and IoT devices, Sepioo® provides the backbone for smart inventory management systems and digital signage.

eachBlockInfo.title: A comprehensive IoT inventory solution
eachBlockInfo.description: PDI Digital’s sepioo® combines a SaaS platform and IoT devices into one seamless solution that automates and digitizes industrial processes.

eachBlockInfo.title: Locate your assets in real time
eachBlockInfo.description: Access real-time geolocation data with GPS precision, indoor and outdoor, and unlock location-based triggers for your workflows (distance traveled, perimeter).

eachBlockInfo.title: Impact across industries
eachBlockInfo.description: From manufacturing and logistics to healthcare and automotive, sepioo® is a flexible solution for a wide range of industries.

MemoryBenefits.subtitle: PDI digital benefits
MemoryBenefits.header: How the PDI digital family of products works
MemoryBenefits.description: Software and hardware systems work together, creating the digital backbone of a smart inventory system.

nextGenBlock.header: Why PDI digital works for you

eachBlockInfo.title: Digitalize your paper-based signage
eachBlockInfo.description: Shift to dynamic information sharing with digital signage and eliminate the need for paper’s associated costs, waste, and labor.

eachBlockInfo.title: Leverage dynamic data displays
eachBlockInfo.description: Share information from your systems and ERP where it’s needed in real time, with instant updates on item status or location.

eachBlockInfo.title: Automate manual processes
eachBlockInfo.description: Create custom triggers based on location data or actioning buttons. Streamline day-to-day operations and reduce errors with LED hints & pick to light.

eachBlockInfo.title: Track your assets in real time
eachBlockInfo.description: Locate your assets with GPS precision — indoor and outdoor — and optimize workflows with location-based triggers.

Features.mainHeader: Enhance day-to-day operations with automated efficiencies
Features.subtitle: Features
Features.header: The PDI digital family of products includes valuable features:
Features.description: LED signal for pick-and-put by light — reduces search time and picking errors Real-time geolocation tracking — provides visibility on assets throughout the complete operation Trigger actions by button-press & sensors — associates can request instructions, a refill, or help; confirm tasks, count inventory, and implement quality testing

EngageProduct.header: Get detailed information on the PDI digital family of products
